Charges, fines and what you can borrow

You can pay your library fines over the phone – call 01473 263838.

Reservation and request charges

How many books, CDs and films you’re allowed to borrow and overdue charges

Reservations
Reserve a title which is in stock or on order in Suffolk libraries Free
We can notify you by email. To register an email address login to your account, let library staff know or call 01473 263838
Notification when title available
Text or email notification Free
Requests: For books and periodicals not in stock which we request from libraries outside Suffolk
Standard request service
We either borrow the book from the national library network or buy it. We do not charge for books we have bought.
Charge for books borrowed from other libraries £5
British Library loans (5 week loan period)
  • £15 for books
  • £10 for articles

+ £3.80 postage

British Library loan extension £4.65
Lost or damaged British Library books (set by British Library) £137.50
Suggest
Request titles titles we don’t have in stock, or ask library staff. Free
What you can borrow Loan period Maximum titles Charge Overdue charge Maximum overdue charge
Adult Books (each) 3 weeks 20 Free 13p per day £6.37
Children’s and Young
Adult Books (each) 		3 weeks 20 Free 1p per day 50p
eBooks – More information 3 weeks 6 Free n/a as download expires after 3 weeks n/a
DVDs Premier
New DVDs available 		1 week 6 £3.00 66p per day £32.34
DVDs (1-2 discs) 1 week 6 £1.00 33p per day £16.17
DVD sets (3+ discs) 2 weeks 6 £2.00 66p per day £32.34
CDs (music) 1 week 6 £1.25 13p per day £6.37
Spoken Word (1-2 cass/CD) 3 weeks 6 Free 13p per day £6.37
Spoken Word (3+ cass/CD) 3 weeks 6 Free 25p per day £12.25
Games
(PlayStation2, DS and Wii) 		1 week 2 £3.00 78p per day £38.22
Language courses, Single and
double items 		6 weeks 6 Free 26p per day £12.74
Language courses, Sets (3+) 6 weeks 6 Free 37p per day £18.13
CDROMs – leisure 1 week 6 £1.55 28p per day £13.72
CDROMs – education 1 week 6 Free 28p per day £13.72
Audio described films on CD: includes the soundtrack, music, sound effects and the dialogue
along with the audio description. Reserve here 		1 week 6 Free 13p a day £6.37
Audio described films on DVD: DVDs with audio description (RNIB). More information can found at: RNIB 1 week 6 Free 33p a day £16.17
If items have not been returned, overdue notices are sent after the 4th and 7th week, and a bill for replacement is sent after the 10th week. The bill includes the overdue charge as well as the replacement cost.
Fax Sending 1st page Sending subsequent pages Collection of received fax
United Kingdom £1.10 £0.50 £1.10
International £1.10 £0.50 £1.10
Other Charges
Replacement library card £1.50 adult / 50p children
Booking a computer Free
A4 black and white photocopy/printout 10p (15p per sheet 2 sided)
A3 black and white photocopy 20p
A4 colour photocopy/printout 30p per sheet
A3 colour photocopy £1.50
Scan document (to email or USB stick) 30p then 10p per sheet
A4 laminating (available at some libraries) £1.00
A3 laminating (available at some libraries) £2.00
Rooms for hire Rooms for hire
Leaflet distribution Eastern Facilities Management Solutions
